attributes.action: Save free school dinners for infants! Lets stop George Osbourne!
attributes.background: George Osbourne is looking to scrap free dinners for infants in november! Im sure every parent/guardian with a child in early stages would like there child to have the choice of free school meals

rejection.details:
I'm sorry - we cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/107913

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
